articles.author: Alison Herman
articles.title: Netflix’s ‘3 Body Problem’ Cements ‘Game of Thrones’ Creators as Masters of Adapting the Unadaptable: TV Review - Variety
articles.description: The Netflix adaptation of Cixin Liu's hit trilogy sees the creators of 'Game of Thrones' once again adapt the unadaptable.
articles.content: Before a rushed ending soured the “Game of Thrones” fanbase on showrunners David Benioff and D.B. Weiss, the duo had rightfully earned acclaim for wrangling a seemingly unadaptable series of books in… [+7865 chars]
